body_html:
Thanks for the comments @qmick and @Davidnet!

Please follow-up on #15140 for CUDA 9.1 status.

I'll also mention for posterity that our official compatibility (for released versions) is described in our documentation:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/install/install_sources.md
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources
